metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33571 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In Django 2.2 before 2.2.24, 3.x before 3.1.12, and 3.2 before 3.2.4,URLValidator, validate_ipv4_address, and validate_ipv46_address do notprohibit leading zero characters in octal literals. This may allow a bypassof access control that is based on IP addresses. (validate_ipv4_address andvalidate_ipv46_address are unaffected with Python 3.9.5+..) .

criterions.comment: python-django: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
